title: Kuro Ai: Hitoyozumakan Inkou Rannyuuroku (Dark Love)
synopsis: Tetsuya's investigation into a luxurious hotel turns over a nest of yakuza and a bizarre orgy cult. On rich silk sheets and velvet chairs, the rich and powerful participate in sex acts so depraved that just witnessing them is likely to turn a man into a monster. But the true purpose of this cult is a pact with evil energies that can literally turn Tetsuya into an inhuman demon.
characters: ['Jounouchi, Minako', 'Gojou, Tetsuya', 'Sogawa, Hazuki', 'Koujin, Rikka', 'Miyabi', 'Houjou, Honoka', 'Mizuno, Kaori', 'Utsumi, Ayaka']
